title: Juice 'Em Up! 2 Premium v1.0.5
description:
Other Time-Management games step back and take note... 

This ainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t your grandmotherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s simulation! Sophisticated, massively featured, highly addictive, unputdownably challenging! This is off the scale and we challenge any game developer to match this unique blend of gaming styles, excitement and sophistication. Fruit juice Tycoon 2 is in a league of its own. Your fingers will be glued to your device!

From the developers of the highly acclaimed Fruit Juice Tycoon, comes a whole new breed of time-management/Match 3/Tycoon action game. Fruit Juice Tycoon 2 includes are the favorite manic Match-3 fruit sorting, the hectic serving to impatient customers, the fantabulous store upgrades, and mammoth challenges.

ADDED is a whole RPG style quest game based in a multi-district city. Expand and conquer with your juice company! Explore and interact with the population of weird and wonderful characters with bizarre requests, all designed to challenge you, and push you to your final goal: to be the ultimate juicer in Fruitville!

FEATURES

MATCH 3 
Sort fruit into groups of three so you have enough juice squeezed to serve customers waiting in line. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t squeeze too much fruit though or youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll waste it. Take part in the Fruit Sorting Championships! Play against other players in matchup mode.

TIME MANAGEMENT 
Pour and serve the correct juice to customers in line; seat your customers at the right tables so they leave satisfied and tell their friends! DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t make them wait too long! Customer satisfaction is crucial to taking over the town. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t make them regret coming to your store!

QUEST MISSIONS 
A whole host of humorous and challenging missions for you to complete, from business challenges, to quirky requests designed to keep you guessing whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s coming next. Fulfilling these missions is essential to making this town YOUR town!

BUSINESS STRATEGY 
Choose when and where to place your stores to maximize your profits and customer rating. Choose to build stores which generate profit or reputation. Building in different districts will give you different benefits.

UPGRADES 
Triple nozzles, super-squeezers, fruit-fridges, jumbo ice-makers, auto-pourers,...the list goes on! 
Crazy Characters - Vast array of weird and wonderful characters on your journey; some will help you, others will hinder you...who can you trust?

STORY 
Dragged from your lazy youth to try and save your grandfatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s juice company. Build your fruit juice chain, from stalls to stores in different areas of the city. YOU have to explore and conquer many districts to explore and conquer
